TopicTitle: Switching v23 career to a v24 science mode 'career'?

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I see that new games can start in sandbox, science or career. I'm starting a new career in 24 but I don't want to abandon my old v23 career. The old career would be perfect for the new science mode. Any way to change it?

Thanks

Bryan
I'm looking for the same thing. I just want to keep playing my saved game the way I was before. Adding the contracts and funds when I'm trying to get to Jool is basically making me start over.

See this thread for answers.
